author: Special Correspondent
text:
A pharmacist at the Sidha wing of the Government Hospital here, allegedly committed suicide by hanging at the hospital storeroom.

Police said that Krishnan (46), the pharmacist, allegedly committed suicide on Sunday night, and the death came to light on Monday morning, when a hospital employee opened the storeroom.

Superintendent of Police Ziaul Haque said that investigation revealed that it was a clear case of suicide, presumably due to depression. Krishnan is survived by his wife Yasodha and twin sons, studying class VI, the police said.
title: Pharmacist commits suicide
